data.name: Seekers Aeterna
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to the world of Seekers Aeterna, traveler!

After dying to a mysterious global cataclysm you wake up trapped in a time loop.

Explore an interconnected Vania-Like world, take part in epic battles, befriend a colorful cast of characters, and rewrite the events with the help of a mysterious girl you can only meet after death.

Features

  • Explore a mysterious interconnected world and uncover its secrets.
  • Meet a chaotic and colorful cast of characters.
  • Take part in epic battles influenced by your actions.
  • Find equipable items and create your own fighting style.
  • Unfold an original and thrilling story yet to be written.
  • Made mostly by one person.

data.short_description: After a mysterious global cataclysm, the last few surviving humans wake up in the disconnected remains of a foreign gothic fantasy world. Take part in epic battles, befriend a colorful cast of characters and explore an interconnected Vania-Like world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core GPU
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
